 PREFIX premis: <http://www.loc.gov/premis/rdf/v1#>  PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  PREFIX ual: <http://terms.library.ualberta.ca/>  PREFIX ualids: <http://terms.library.ualberta.ca/identifiers/>  PREFIX ualid: <http://terms.library.ualberta.ca/id/>  PREFIX ualdate: <http://terms.library.ualberta.ca/date/>  PREFIX ualrole: <http://terms.library.ualberta.ca/role/>  PREFIX ualthesis: <http://terms.library.ualberta.ca/thesis/>  PREFIX info: <info:fedora/fedora-system:def/model#>  PREFIX dcterm: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>  PREFIX pcdm: <http://pcdm.org/models#>  PREFIX works: <http://projecthydra.org/works/models#>  PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>  PREFIX fedora: <http://fedora.info/definitions/v4/repository#>  PREFIX iana: <http://www.iana.org/assignments/relation/>  PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>  PREFIX acl: <http://projecthydra.org/ns/auth/acl#>  PREFIX webacl: <http://www.w3.org/ns/auth/acl#>  PREFIX scholar: <http://scholarsphere.psu.edu/ns#>  PREFIX rels: <info:fedora/fedora-system:def/relations-external#>  PREFIX vivo: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#>  PREFIX bibo: <http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/>  PREFIX mrels: <http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators/>  PREFIX prism: <http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/3.0/>  PREFIX cc: <http://creativecommons.org/ns#>  PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/>  PREFIX lang: <http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/iso639-2/>  PREFIX mrel: <http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators/>  PREFIX naf: <http://id.loc.gov/authorities/names/>  PREFIX swrc: <http://ontoware.org/swrc/ontology#>  PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>  CONSTRUCT { ?resource info:hasModel 'IRItem'^^xsd:string ; rdf:type pcdm:Object; rdf:type ual:Community ; <http://terms.library.ualberta.ca/depositor> ?depositor ; <http://purl.org/dc/terms/description> ?description ; <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> ?title ; <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/creator> ?creator }     WHERE { ?resource info:hasModel 'Collection'^^xsd:string ; OPTIONAL { ?resource ualids:is_community 'true'^^xsd:boolean } . OPTIONAL { ?resource ualid:is_community 'true'^^xsd:boolean } . OPTIONAL { ?resource ual:is_community 'true'^^xsd:boolean } . OPTIONAL { ?resource <http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators/dpt> ?depositor . FILTER (?depositor!='') } . OPTIONAL { ?resource <http://purl.org/dc/terms/description> ?description . FILTER (?description!='') } . OPTIONAL { ?resource <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> ?title . FILTER (?title!='') } . OPTIONAL { ?resource <http://purl.org/dc/terms/creator> ?creator . FILTER (?creator!='') } }
